translations: v.把……载入正式记录；行驶，行进；采伐（森林的）树木（log 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 记录数据，登录数据；存入数据
电测井；电法测井；电气检层法

sentences.sentence: The Bolivian government has granted logging concessions covering 22 million hectares.
sentences.translation: 玻利维亚政府批准了在2 200万公顷土地上的伐木特许权。

sentences.sentence: Logging companies would have to leave a central area of the forest before the end of the year.
sentences.translation: 伐木公司可能得于年底前在森林中留出一个中心地带。

sentences.sentence: If all else fails, keep calm and try logging on again!
sentences.translation: 如果所有办法都失败了，保持镇静并再次尝试登录！
